title: SOLD: a trio of T212 Obak Victoria players...

posts.post_content:
Please see the attached scan for condition.  Price with shipping are below.  I'm definitely open to trades, and will even trade in your favor should you have something I am looking for (T209s, T210s, T211s at the moment).  Please send me a PM if interested.
